member.name: T:KafkaAdapters.MeasurementExtensions
member.summary: Defines extension methods for implementations for use in Kafka.

member.name: M:KafkaAdapters.MeasurementExtensions.KakfaSerialize(GSF.TimeSeries.IMeasurement,Misakai.Kafka.Message)
member.summary: Serializes an instance into key-value buffers for a Kafka message.
member.param: Kafka message to hold serialized key-value buffers.

member.name: M:KafkaAdapters.MeasurementExtensions.KafkaDeserialize(Misakai.Kafka.Message)
member.summary: Deserializes a Kafka message into a .
member.returns: value deserialized from a time-series serialized Kafka message.

member.name: T:KafkaAdapters.TimeSeriesLogger
member.summary: Defines an proxy for Kafka log messages.

member.name: T:KafkaAdapters.TimeSeriesConsumer
member.summary: Represents a Kafka adapter that will receive time-series data to send into the Time-Series Library.

member.name: M:KafkaAdapters.TimeSeriesConsumer.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new .

member.name: P:KafkaAdapters.TimeSeriesConsumer.Servers
member.summary: Gets or sets Kafka servers to connect to, comma separated.

member.name: P:KafkaAdapters.TimeSeriesConsumer.Topic
member.summary: Gets or sets the Kafka topic name.

member.name: P:KafkaAdapters.TimeSeriesConsumer.SupportsTemporalProcessing
member.summary: Gets the flag indicating if this adapter supports temporal processing.

member.name: P:KafkaAdapters.TimeSeriesConsumer.UseAsyncConnect
member.summary: Gets flag that determines if the data output stream connects asynchronously.
member.remarks: Derived classes should return true when data output stream connects asynchronously, otherwise return false.

member.name: P:KafkaAdapters.TimeSeriesConsumer.Status
member.summary: Returns the detailed status of the data input source. Derived classes should extend status with implementation specific information.

member.name: M:KafkaAdapters.TimeSeriesConsumer.Initialize
member.summary: Initializes .

member.name: M:KafkaAdapters.TimeSeriesConsumer.AttemptConnection
member.summary: Attempts to connect to data output stream.
member.remarks: Derived classes should attempt connection to data output stream here. Any exceptions thrown by this implementation will result in restart of the connection cycle.

member.name: M:KafkaAdapters.TimeSeriesConsumer.AttemptDisconnection
member.summary: Attempts to disconnect from data output stream.
member.remarks: Derived classes should attempt disconnect from data output stream here. Any exceptions thrown by this implementation will be reported to host via event.

member.name: M:KafkaAdapters.TimeSeriesConsumer.GetShortStatus(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a short one-line status of this .
member.param: Maximum number of available characters for display.
member.returns: A short one-line summary of the current status of this .

member.name: T:KafkaAdapters.TimeSeriesProducer
member.summary: Represents a Kafka adapter that will produce time-series data based on output from the Time-Series Library.

member.name: F:KafkaAdapters.TimeSeriesProducer.DefaultTopic
member.summary: Defines the default value for the property.

member.name: P:KafkaAdapters.TimeSeriesProducer.Servers
member.summary: Gets or sets Kafka servers to connect to, comma separated.

member.name: P:KafkaAdapters.TimeSeriesProducer.Topic
member.summary: Gets or sets the Kafka topic name.

member.name: P:KafkaAdapters.TimeSeriesProducer.OutputIsForArchive
member.summary: Gets the flag that determines if measurements sent to this are destined for archival.
member.remarks: This property allows the to calculate statistics on how many measurements have been archived per minute. Historians would normally set this property to true; other custom exports would set this property to false.

member.name: P:KafkaAdapters.TimeSeriesProducer.UseAsyncConnect
member.summary: Gets flag that determines if the data output stream connects asynchronously.
member.remarks: Derived classes should return true when data output stream connects asynchronously, otherwise return false.

member.name: P:KafkaAdapters.TimeSeriesProducer.Status
member.summary: Returns the detailed status of the data input source. Derived classes should extend status with implementation specific information.

member.name: M:KafkaAdapters.TimeSeriesProducer.Initialize
member.summary: Initializes .

member.name: M:KafkaAdapters.TimeSeriesProducer.AttemptConnection
member.summary: Attempts to connect to data output stream.
member.remarks: Derived classes should attempt connection to data output stream here. Any exceptions thrown by this implementation will result in restart of the connection cycle.

member.name: M:KafkaAdapters.TimeSeriesProducer.AttemptDisconnection
member.summary: Attempts to disconnect from data output stream.
member.remarks: Derived classes should attempt disconnect from data output stream here. Any exceptions thrown by this implementation will be reported to host via event.

member.name: M:KafkaAdapters.TimeSeriesProducer.GetShortStatus(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a short one-line status of this .
member.param: Maximum number of available characters for display.
member.returns: A short one-line summary of the current status of this .

member.name: M:KafkaAdapters.TimeSeriesProducer.ProcessMeasurements(GSF.TimeSeries.IMeasurement[])
member.summary: Serializes measurements to data output stream.
